Game Lounge is a *work in progress* app that lets you organize all of your gaming buisness. Even though Macs aren't exactly known for their gaming capabilities. Bye, ugly steam client. Adi√≥s, inconsistent ways of launching games. Begon, searching through your Launchpad to find an App Store game. Hello, Game Lounge.
